RESPONSE TEXT: I'm Stockton. You've heard of Old Man Stockton, yes?
I run three caravans that travel throughout the Commonwealth.
You ever buy anything from Goodneighbor or Diamond City? Odds are, it's been delivered by my men.
If you ever find yourself needing to buy or sell something, especially in bulk, talk to one of my employees in the market.
You look thirsty. Enjoy an iced cold Nuka-Cola on me, friend.
I hope you find your visit here profitable.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: NPCMOldManStockton: Thank you for saving Amelia.
RESPONSE TEXT: But right now is a perilous time for any Railroad agents.
DIALOGUE AFTER: OldManStockton: I'm leaving the Commonwealth, and I recommend you do, as well.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: OldManStockton: But right now is a perilous time for any Railroad agents.
RESPONSE TEXT: I'm leaving the Commonwealth, and I recommend you do, as well.

RESPONSE TEXT: Caravans are attacked all too often. I thought it was just an unfortunate coincedence. The evidence pointed to raiders.

But it turned out well. So well, that you deserve to be rewarded.
DIALOGUE AFTER: OldManStockton: I had hired a mercenary to do the job, but clearly I should've contacted you instead, eh? Thank you.

After what she went through with those monsters, maybe she suspects. But there's nothing to be done about that now.
A runner has already picked her up. Hopefully the poor girl finds a safe new home.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: Helping you is becoming a habit.
